title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Designing Digital Youth Learning Experiences Based on Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design and execute science projects using digital tools, exploring a wide range of STEAM topics.
In a constructivist, choice-driven learning environment, learners identify their areas of interest and enhance collaborative problem-solving skills.
In large-class settings, apply an assessment system reflecting individual learners' choice and interests to derive summative performance outcomes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
